title: Ticketmaster－Buy, Sell Tickets to Concerts, Sports
description:
Ticketmaster gives you access to millions of live event tickets and makes it easy to buy, sell, transfer, and get in - so you can get on with making memories that last.

We are the Official Ticketing Partner of the NFL, NBA, NHL, and USTA. Add in our exclusive partnerships with thousands of venues, artists, bands, theater tours, and broadway shows and shopping with Ticketmaster gives you unparalleled access to the most memorable live events worldwide.
 
Ticket management at your fingertips. You’re always just a few clicks away from securing the perfect seats to the live events and shows you love.
 
BUY SIMPLY
- Search millions of events and get real-time updates as new listings go live.
- Use interactive 3-D venue maps and see your seat view before you buy.

CHANGE OF PLANS?
- List your tickets on our trusted resale marketplace and sell to other fans.
- Transfer your seats to friends and family for free.
 
PROTECT YOURSELF FROM SCALPERS
- Avoid forgeries “similar location” seats with Verified Tickets. The seats you buy the seats you’ll sit in and backed by our 100% guarantee.

YOUR PHONE IS YOUR TICKET
- Scan into your events with the app or upload your seats to Apple Wallet (mobile-entry events only).
- See all your event info in one convenient place.
 
NEVER MISS OUT ON AN EVENT
- Get alerts about your favorite events, artists, bands, and venues.

Download the Ticketmaster app and go live.

REACH OUT TO US
Website: www.ticketmaster.com
Twitter: www.twitter.com/ticketmaster
Instagram: www.instagram.com/ticketmaster
Facebook: www.facebook.com/ticketmaster

recentChanges:
• Get through the purchase flow faster by scanning a credit card. Save time and remove the friction of manual credit card entry by scanning a credit card to purchase tickets to your favorite event.
• A new onboarding experience for a seamless introduction into the app!
• Every update of our app includes reliability and performance improvements
comments: Everytime I check events, favorites, notifications, and account the application completely crashes. This is heavily disappointing, because if I were to attend an event and the app crashes I won't be able to go inside the venue. What would be the purpose of having the app then? The application is meant to be accessible to users (who chose to use their phone as their ticket access), but it's pointless if the ticket is inaccessible to us online through the application.

The worst app ever. It logged me out and won't let me back in. I spent way to much money to not be able to see my ticket. I've had the ticket for a month and it decides to do this. Why are you not fixing it. People need their tickets that they paid you way to much money for. It's very nerve wracking not to know if the app will be working in time for my concert. Very poor customer service.

Up until the last update, this app worked okay. Now this last update has caused the app to freeze and shut down every time I try to access an option on the left side bar. Email support is not available to help, rendering this app virtually useless to see the status on postponed/canceled events that I have paid for.

Although I love the Ticketmaster App due to the ease of it, I am disappointed in the fact that we are not getting event updates through the app. I need to know if events are cancelled or rescheduled! I have numerous events that I have purchased tickets for months in advance and we are now coming up on those events without any notice! Your customers need to know and the app would be the best way to disseminate that information! Please add that into the app! We need to know!

Just bought tickets for a concert in a month. I havent been able to log into the app for weeks! Just shows a blank white screen. There is no way I am able to view my QR codes without the app unless I get them mailed to be for an extra fee- which is NOT happening. I have already emailed the customer service and they havent gotten back to me. Please fix the login issue. Time is ticking! (will fix the 1-star review when resoved)

Mostly good. Most movies play right away. I don't mind a few ads if I can watch free. But there are certain times it movies that you just keep hitting watch and watching that first ad and then do it again and again. That's when I give up and choose another app.

This app is ok but the only problem I have is when you stop watching your show then you come back you have to find the place you stopped watching your show. It takes too long and its annoying also when the ads pop up when the actors are saying something. It's also good cause you can watch pretty much every thing .

This App Is One Of The Best So Far. I Hope Things Don't Change Like All The Others. It Does Contain Ads, But For A Free App That Offers New Movies It Is Worth Watching An Ad Or Two. Keep Up The Great Work Developers.

title: StubHub - Live Event Tickets
description:
StubHub is the top destination for buying and selling tickets to the world's best events. Ticket prices may be higher or lower than face value.

MLB, NBA, NHL, and concert tickets at your favorite venue and more – StubHub has your tickets for amazing experiences! Over 10 million upcoming live sports events, concerts, theater shows, gigs and tours are available. 

StubHub recently ranked #1 in Newsweek’s America’s Best Customer Service in 2019. Tickets orders are 100% guaranteed, with customer service all the way to your seat. Get a coupon worth 120% of your original order if an event is cancelled.

Get tickets for your favorite MLB, NBA, NHL team, theater show or music concert from the day they go on sale to the day of the event. See the venue and find out which artists are performing from your phone.

Buy event tickets using the largest ticket selection with StubHub! Concerts, MLB, NBA, NHL tickets, local shows and more.

Sell tickets easily right from the StubHub app if you have a change of plans. 
STUBHUB FEATURES

• Event Recommendations: Let the fun find you with event recommendations based on your Spotify account, downloaded music, and favorite artists and teams
• Friends: Find out what your friends are into and which events they’re going to
• Interactive venue maps: See the view before you buy on selected maps
• Virtual venue View: Get an immersive, 3-D view from your section for selected venues
• Google Pay: Speed through checkout with Google Pay (US events only)
• Mobile tickets: Get in with your phone – no need to print!*
• Wear OS by Google: View your tickets, find events and more, just by looking at your wrist
• Venue and artist info: Check on upcoming events and discover similar artists
• Ticket price alerts: Tell us what you want to pay and get notified when there’s a match
• My tickets: Track your orders, view your mobile tickets and get ready for your next event
• Sell tickets: List tickets, manage your listings and view your sales
• Event categories: View events by category to discover events based on your interests or mood. Concerts, NBA games, comedy shows and more.
• Barcode scanning: Attract more buyers and keep tickets you're selling listed for longer by scanning ticket barcodes*

Buy and resell tickets for local events with StubHub. Download now!

*Available for selected teams and venues

recentChanges: We hope you’re enjoying the StubHub app! In this update, we’ve fixed a few things to make the app faster and easier to use.
comments: Bad experience leads to a poor rating and negative comments. I purchased tickets to a off Broadway play in NY a week prior. The tickets weren't available for download 'til a before the play. With StubHub's guarantee I trusted that I would be good to and I could go ahead and plan the rest of my trip. Did I forget to mention that my wife and I flew in from TX. After a flight, checking into our hotel, and around 10 pm the day before the play, we still had no tickets. Horrible experience for sure.

The app works fine, I even sold tickets that I purchased by accident to someone else through stubhub, I am not going to be buying anymore tickets though because the fees are ridiculous. I paid double because of my mistake but the fees are just not worth it... so expect the fees when purchasing tickets.... I've been using them for years but in finally fed up with paying so much...

I found it difficult to find my tickets. I didn't know where to find them. Was not aware that the tickets were sent to Ticketmaster. It was very confusing..finally found them and needed the help of MSG to get them on my phone. I feel there should be better instruction when you make the purchase.

Its important to make sure the email address is correct before you buy tickets, i screwed up and my tickets went to a deactivated acct.but StubHub made it right and we made it to the show...it was fantastic
Great service! Tickets always delivered in time for game! Information and updates sent in timely fashion. StubHub is the best for tickets

title: VR Anime Avatars for VRChat
description:
Especially for those who are just starting to get acquainted with the VRChat and want to install their first avatar, we have collected the most popular avatars in our application.
Meet your favorite characters from video games, movies and more. VR Chat avatars offers an endless collection of VR avatars. Always when you're looking for new VR avatar you can use our app to download a new one. We often update our collection of avatars ( skins ) for our users. 

This app provides an opportunity to players to choose a virtual avatar created other people. Jump into hundreds of awe inspiring environments and meet unique skins every day.

Note: This app is an unofficial application for VRChat. App maded by fans to fans of this game. This app is not affiliated in any way with VR Chat creators. title: Invitation Card Maker Free by Greetings Island
description:
⚜️ Stand out from the crowd! ⚜️ 

Greetings Island app is a 100% FREE Invitation Maker App.
Easily customize your design, share it via WhatsApp, SMS or facebook, or print it.

👭 Wedding invitations & cards
🎂 Birthday greeting cards & invitations
🎄 Christmas card maker
🎉 Party invitation maker
👶 Baby shower invitation
⛪ Baptism invitations
🎓 Graduation invitation & cards

Grabbing attention nowadays is tough - and even more so when organising a party or event. The first thing any potential partygoer looks at is the invitation - get it right, and they’re looking forward to partying with you; get it wrong, and your invite is going straight to the bin. The same goes for greeting cards: you need to make your stand out if your message is going to be remembered. 

Customizing your own cards used to be a lengthy, expensive process - but not anymore! That’s right - there’s no more need for whole-family trips to the photo shop for the annual Christmas picture, nor all the hassle of finding the *perfect* graphic designer to get your wedding invites done. With Greeting Island’s Cards & invitation Maker, that’s all long in the past. 

That’s right - all you need is your smartphone or tablet and 5 minutes! Invitation Maker by Greetings Island gives you endless choices of inspiration and templates, which are all easily customisable too! Personalise your greeting cards and invitations, and make your event or greeting card really stand out from the crowd! 

🌸⚜️Get started NOW! Your beautiful custom graphic design is just a click away, and it’s all FREE! Download Greetings Island - Greeting Cards & Invitation Maker now and start creating!⚜️🌸

We’re not all natural graphic designers and artists - if you're going to get the design you love and want, you need to know how to use some pretty complicated tools, not to mention oodles of talent and perspective. Let’s be honest, that’s why people study it for years. 

The Cards & Invitation Maker lets you blissfully skip the tricky bits by handing you hundreds of unique templates, designed by real professionals! It’s easy to use and customise too, with loads of mesmerizing options to inspire you: you’ll be creating the best greeting cards or invitations EVER! Create typography, edit texts and fonts, add a photo, or even change colours around easily and quickly!

🌸⚜️Get started NOW! Your beautiful custom graphic design is just a click away, and it’s all FREE! Download Greetings Island - Greeting Cards & Invitation Maker
 now and start creating!⚜️🌸


HOW DOES Invitation Maker by Greetings Island WORK?

• Select category: Parties (Anniversary, BBQ, Brunch…), Wedding, Birthday, Holidays and much more 
• Choose a template you like venngage, from 1000's of options
• Customise your card or invitation! Use the text editing tools, add photos, change fonts, create typography & select unique colour combinations to suit your every vibe
• That’s it! Once you’ve finished editing - send your awesome design to your friends or to print!

🌸⚜️Get started NOW! Your beautiful custom graphic design is just a click away, and it’s all FREE! Download Invitation Maker by Greetings Island now and start creating!⚜️🌸

comments: It has been an amazing experience on the app. I have access to a lot of templates that are convenient to adapt to my specifications. I can save my work and continue design at convenience, printing options are amazing too. Only setback is the continuous ads when moving from one stage to another. Otherwise, it's so far the best app for IV designs I've come across.

Great app with lots of assets and ability to save drafts and final images. Obviously its a free app so have to put up with ads, but that's ok, keep it free I say! Editing is ok, nice font assets, but lacks ability to scale images to your own sizing. Drop shadows for fonts would be great too, for layering on images for that professional look.

Just going through some designs now, but this seems like a truly great Invitation Maker App. Plenty of designs to choose from and many options for fonts, size, colours. Early days but like I said, so far it is great. Many thanks to the developers.😀 After using for several days I've concluded that if you can't find a card to suit every occasion, there's something wrong. Easy to edit, save, share, update changes. Excellent app that I highly recommend. A keeper for me!

I really like this app, it has so many different layouts to choose from, you can edit it however you want, plenty of categories, it does have adds, but but not overwhemingly, i'd recommend this app to anyone wanting to create an invitation for anything.

Easy navigation, heaps of templates avaipable for different event types. Editing options are easy to use. I am liking this app so far for classy and stylish wedding stationery. I will probably also use this for other invitations and card making. This is the best one I've tried yet and I've used at least a dozen.

title: SeatGeek – Tickets to Sports, Concerts, Broadway
description:
SeatGeek is the smart way to buy and resell tickets to thousands of sporting events (NFL, NBA, NHL, MLB, MLS), concerts, festivals, and Broadway/theater shows. Tickets are backed by SeatGeek's 100% buyer guarantee, and resellers may list tickets above or below face value.

FEATURES
◆ Interactive Seating Charts
Explore the best deals mapped on interactive seating charts with panoramic photographs from every section. Know what the view from your seat looks like before you buy tickets. 

◆ Deal Score
Never worry about getting ripped off again, every deal on SeatGeek is color-coded from best to worst based on value. 

◆ Mobile Tickets
Show your e-ticket in the SeatGeek app to gain access to venues, no printer necessary. 

◆ Send Tickets
No more waiting outside the stadium for friends in the rain. Send extra tickets to your friends’ phones in a tap for free or for $$$ (US only).

◆ Sell Your Tickets
Can’t attend tomorrow night’s concert? Sell your tickets on SeatGeek’s Marketplace in one tap. SeatGeek will even recommend the best price to help you quickly sell your tickets. 

◆ Discover Nearby Events
Easily browse tickets for any live event. Search by team, artist, venue, genre, or sport (baseball, basketball, hockey, football, Nascar, etc.) to see upcoming events near you. 

◆ Buy Your Way
Conveniently pay via Google Pay or Credit Card.

◆ The Daily Tap
Enter up to once a day to win free tickets to live events nearby.
descriptionHTML:
SeatGeek is the smart way to buy and resell tickets to thousands of sporting events (NFL, NBA, NHL, MLB, MLS), concerts, festivals, and Broadway/theater shows. Tickets are backed by SeatGeek's 100% buyer guarantee, and resellers may list tickets above or below face value.

FEATURES
◆ Interactive Seating Charts
Explore the best deals mapped on interactive seating charts with panoramic photographs from every section. Know what the view from your seat looks like before you buy tickets.

◆ Deal Score
Never worry about getting ripped off again, every deal on SeatGeek is color-coded from best to worst based on value.

◆ Mobile Tickets
Show your e-ticket in the SeatGeek app to gain access to venues, no printer necessary.

◆ Send Tickets
No more waiting outside the stadium for friends in the rain. Send extra tickets to your friends’ phones in a tap for free or for $$$ (US only).

◆ Sell Your Tickets
Can’t attend tomorrow night’s concert? Sell your tickets on SeatGeek’s Marketplace in one tap. SeatGeek will even recommend the best price to help you quickly sell your tickets.

◆ Discover Nearby Events
Easily browse tickets for any live event. Search by team, artist, venue, genre, or sport (baseball, basketball, hockey, football, Nascar, etc.) to see upcoming events near you.

◆ Buy Your Way
Conveniently pay via Google Pay or Credit Card.

◆ The Daily Tap
Enter up to once a day to win free tickets to live events nearby.
summary: Buy and sell tickets to sports, concerts, theater, festivals, and comedy events
recentChanges: Meet our latest feature, The Daily Tap — We're giving away tickets to the hottest events. For free. And every day you tap is another chance to win. Navigate to the Browse tab to enter! You'll also find our completely redesigned in-app experience created to enhance the final hours leading up to your game, concert, or show. For better planning, we now provide precise weather updates, venue bag policies, even directions — all right here in the app.
comments: Prior to the last 2 regulation Portland Timbers matches I had issues with the Seat Geek app. On the 1st occasion, I couldn't access my tickets at all and had to get physical tickets from Customer Service. That meant I missed the 1st 20 minutes of a match. The next time I couldn't send the tickets at all when I wasn't able attend. Again, why should I have to go to customer service to get this fixed? Please fix the app.

They take a service fee to provide ONE service - legit tickets. Imagine getting all excited for a show with your friends, and then getting there and being told your ticket had 'already been scanned' and you cannot enter. On top of that it's taken over a week to get a refund. DO NOT USE. --- I got my refund but +20% didn't even cover the cost of getting to the event not to mention the exteme disappointment of finding out you weren't going to get to see the show.

Why do you need to send an email to verify the payout method and why is this information no where on the app or mobile site? I had to login to the full site on a computer to figure out what the issue was for selling tickets. There should be functionality in the app to upload your government ID or AT LEAST an error message with the appropriate information. You can't even view how much you spent on tickets without using the full site.
Used this app to purchase tix for concerts and sporting events for about 2 years now. Hasn't crashed once, never had any issues with my purchases, very easy to use.
So far it seems like a wonderful app ! And I have seen this company help many people. Not only by providing tickets, but also by being generous with money to people who need/deserve it !

title: Survival Maps
description:
Survival Maps for Minecraft PE gives you a chance to download and install any map you like, directly from the app with just a few clicks. Survival Maps does use the internet, so please be aware of your data usage.
It is necessary to have Minecraft Pocket Edition on your device to use our app. Each map has a title, description and screenshot so you know what to expect before downloading them.
Survival maps are focused on providing an interesting survival experience for the player. These maps are typically just like regular generated Minecraft maps with extra structures installed by the designer to create an experience different than simply generating a random Survival map at home. For example, the map designer might build an aircraft that has crashed onto an island along with some supply chests to simulate a plane crash survival scenario.
More advanced Survival maps incorporate elements that automate elements of the game experience.


Here are some examples of Survival maps:

- Black Celestial Map
- Mega Skyblock Survival
- Emerald Town Survival  
- Lucky Tree
- Sky World Maps
- Hardcore Chicken Block Map
- Sky Island Maps
- Islands of Eden Map 
- Desert Village Survival Map
- Super Sweet Survival Map

We hope you will find your favorite Survival maps for MCPE here ! Download Survival Maps  and start your journey with a great collection of maps!

WARNING: This is an unofficial application for Minecraft. This application is not affiliated in any way with Mojang AB. The Minecraft Name, the Brand and the Assets are all property of Mojang AB or their respectful owner. All rights reserved. In accordance with http://account.mojang.com/documents/brand_guidelines

Most PE maps these days use the .mcworld format. Just click it and it will automatically install the  map into your game no matter what system you're on.

title: Sky Rider Control
description:
Compatible with drones with Wi-Fi cameras, this app can take photos and record videos, as well as live streams through your smart phone.
To begin controlling the drone’s throttle, yaw, pitch and roll controls through the app, open the app and press “ON.” 
Press “3D” on the app to enjoy a fully immersive and exciting flying adventure through your smart phone with VR goggles. 
Pressing “180°” on the app will rotate the image on your phone 180-degrees.
Pressing “30%” on the app will change the speed of the drones. There are 3 speeds: low(30%), medium(60%) and high(100%).
Additionally, the app offers intuitive mode, 360-degree flip, headless mode, recalibration, auto spin, LED light switch control, one-key takeoff and land, and more.

comments: Works great. It works using wifi and not blue tooth. You have to pick it using your phone wifi settings. I'm guessing the low ratings are from people that didn't read the instructions and tried blue tooth like I did at first.
I`d like to recommend a update to the video gallery. You know when you got done recording a video with your voice can you please add a video/voice button. Thanks.

You have to open your WiFi and connect to the drone for the app to work. I was having the same problem as all of the other folks...app just really didn't do anything, seemed to never open. Once I connected to the drone's wifi I had video and things were working like they should. It would be helpful if the instructions were more clear on this point.

We installed this app with no problem. It took a little while to figure out what all the settings and options are. But they were listed in our owner's manual. This is the first time we've had an app that really works with our phone. We do have a decent phone, it's a Moto G4 Plus. Maybe the app doesn't work with older phones and older operating systems (we have a newer Android system). The camera and videocamera work pretty well, but the video stops taking video at somewhere between the 9 and 30 second mark. So we wrote to the company (Sky Rider) to see they can troubleshoot that. Anyone else have a video freeze issue?

comments: Horrible! Customer service is horrendous. My first purchase of tickets: I was on the phone with their representative for the first 45 min of a concert because the virtual tickets were unable to scan. Before they finally sent me new tickets that were not corrupt. The second purchase: The date of my concert was postponed, and when I asked to exchange or refund my tickets they told me that was not possible, AND it is not possible for me to resell my tickets on their website or app.

Horrible! A giant pain to access tickets. High fees. On top of that, I can't download my ticket from the app. If the app is down, I'm screwed. Just want my f###ing tickets emailed or downloaded. Too much to ask after I paid a 30% fee for the service? Aparently so. Never again.

More verification steps than my bank and more sketchy-looking than a pirate NFL stream, but it's the only way I could get tickets ahead of the game. And why the hell can't I print my damn tickets? Oh yeah, cause they want to be on my phone. Uninstalling the minute I'm through the gate but they already got my data. All I can do is leave this review and go back to scalpers next time.

I was looking for tickets to a concert. When I started to fill out the info for the tickets when it came to the part for payment I put in the info of credit card and right away I get a notification from my back that there were 4 charges from vivid seats and I never hit ( place order ) button. Now I'm charged for tickets I never purchased

Only use this app of you're desperate, because the service fees are f'n ridiculously high! 2 tickets cost me an extra $103.44! I then paid $24.00 for event insurance, but that is on me. The price shown should include taxes and fees. Other wise your getting blindsided with extra cost!

I downloaded it because one girl raved about her calendar, she is right, it makes saving notes very convenient.

A lot of potential! Almost 5 stars! :) 1. Add "go to date" function. 2.Add dark themes. 3. Include (at least) 3 years - preceding, current and following. Most users would want to preserve and be able to refer back to old notes. 4. Since it's a Canadian calendar, it'd be nice to add the ability to enable/disable province specific holidays.
It's not bad. However I would like the option of a reminder for dates with a pop up note or a notification noise.
I love this app because you can write more than one note and you can plan the whole year than just one month.IT IS JUST AMAZING I LOVE IT.
Pretty good calendar except you have to go back and forth on different screens too much.

title: MyWed ❤️ Wedding Planner with Checklist and Budget
description:
MyWed is a wedding planner that will keep all the information about the wedding in one place, without any notes in a personal organizer, lots of leaflets and business cards that are constantly lost!
Plan pre-wedding arrangements and tasks (the application will remind you when and what needs to be done), monitor the wedding budget, make lists of vendors and guests, etc. Everything is simple, reliable and convenient!

💗 Checklist
Add, edit and delete the tasks that you need for wedding preparation. And the app will inform you what and when to do it! Install the pre-wedding arrangement widget on the phone's home screen in order to remember everything!

💗 Budget
Make a list of wedding expenditures and payments. The app will help to monitor the wedding budget.

💗 Guests
Make a list of guests; arrange a sitting plan for guests; divide guests into groups (the groom's/bride's side, etc.) and plan the menu. You can easily contact them in the app!

💗 Vendors
Make lists of vendors with contact information and other data. Call and text them directly in the application. You can link expenditures on the contractors' services with your total budget, so you will not forget how much and who you paid or plan to pay to.

Also:
💍 Weddings. Your friend is also getting married, and you want to help her? Or maybe you are a wedding planner? In our application you can help to organize several weddings at once.
💍 Collaborators. Does your spouse want to control your wedding expenses? Or maybe you want your mother or sister to help you to organize your wedding? They can monitor the wedding preparation in the application, and if you allow, then they can make their notes!
💍 Countdown. The days before the wedding will fly faster with a colorful and stylish countdown. You can install a special widget on the home screen of your phone so you will see the countdown to your wedding.

Advantages:
💍 Reliable. Are you worried that you may lose data if your phone or tablet breaks down?  Do not worry! Sign in, and we will save all the information on the server, and if necessary, synchronize it on all your devices.
💍 Free. Most application features are available for free. But if you need more features, for example, you want to add more data or change the design of the countdown, you buy Premium for the wedding – and you will get access to all the features of the application.
💍 Safe. The application is totally safe: all data about your wedding (contacts, media, etc.) are in strict confidentiality; the application does not make calls and does not send SMS without the owner's consent. All the terms the user agrees when installing the application are necessary for correct operation and convenience.

MyWed will help to make the wedding preparation easier than ever!

If you liked our app, please rate it on Google Play. If you have any questions or difficulties, please contact us via email info@mywed.app.

title: Gametime - Tickets to Sports, Concerts, Theater
description:
Gametime is the app that helps *you* score last minute ticket deals to all your favorite events!  

Did you know ticket prices for your favorite events - sports, music, and theater - actually go down the closer you get to showtime?  Get the best deals, see the view from your seats, and utilize Gametime’s super-simple checkout process to get into events even after they have started. Mobile ticket delivery helps save paper and printing headaches. Easy mobile ticket sharing lets you send tickets to all your friends so they can join you in the fun.

SCORE GREAT DEALS
- Take advantage of falling ticket prices as you get closer to the event time. 
- Buy tickets up to 90-minutes after the start of the event.

EASY TICKET BUYING
- The best seats at the lowest prices = big savings!
- Utilize venue maps to make easy seat and price comparisons to find the exact seat you want.  
- Panoramic photos show the exact view from any section. 
- 2-Click checkout process.
- Mobile delivery allows you to buy and walk into the event without missing a step.  

NO HIDDEN FEES
- None of the added “printing fees” or “convenience fees” that other companies love to add onto their prices at checkout.  
- Pick your seats, see the full cost, and click to buy.  
- No add-on costs.  Ever.  

ENVIRONMENTALLY FRIENDLY
- Mobile ticket delivery saves paper & ink. 
- Send tickets to friends directly to their mobile phones, they don’t need to print anything either!

EASILY SELL TICKETS  
- List and price tickets with just a few taps. 
- If you have paper tickets (boo!) simply take a picture to have them listed to sell digitally.  
- Get text updates as soon as your tickets sell.
- Get paid through PayPal or in Gametime credit.

Gametime is THE ticket app for all major sporting events including top baseball, football, hockey, and basketball from all the top leagues (MLB, NFL, NBA, NHL, MLS, & NCAA).  Discover the top concerts from hit artists (Taylor Swift, Billie Eillish, Drake, Post Malone, Bruno Mars, Jonas Brothers, Mumford & Sons, Blink-182, and more!). Don’t miss out on top theater shows (Hamilton, The Book of Mormon, Les Misrables).  Also other events like Monster Jam, WWE, and hit comedy tours (such as Nick Offerman, Aziz Ansari, and Trevor Noah).  

We believe in shared experiences (bring your friends!) and the power and enjoyment of live entertainment.    

Shop, compare, and save with Gametime.

comments: Able to get tickets last minute. Dev's have some issues to workout, however you will receive your tickets. I suggest having your tickets loaded before you get to the venue. I am a contractor for the three largest wireless carriers in the USA, towers near sporting and concert venues the day of an event are always overloaded. Do yourself a favor and load before you get to the venue, a screenshot will also work. Cheers!

The experience in buying tickets is very easy but over time the fee amount above the actual ticket price has raised significantly since first coming out and they do not indicate what it is for. It'll give you a price for each individual ticket and then once selected have a total for you to buy much above the ticket price and no where does it explain what the extra money is for before you pay for them. Also for concerts, if arena name is too long it doesn't show the city it is in within the space

Game time is the ticket app I use for my Orioles tickets, the prices are lower by far over every other app I've used and the interface is very attractive. The veiw of my seat is probably my favorite feature. It's very extensive so I can do all of my event searching in just one place. Thank you gametime and keep up the good work!

Took a long time and several attempts trying numerous log ins to finally get into the Game time ap. Made very nervous of my recent purchase and took time away from the many other things I was to do instead of fight with this. I just hope I get my tickets and will be able to get into game??? When I can view them I think I'm going to print them out if I can just to be on the safe side. Very inconvenient.

My favorite app to use for spring training games in Arizona. Fees are relatively high compared to other sites, however prices are almost always lower than StubHub, SeatGeek or others. Usually a lower all in price to purchase tickets. Selling tickets is also much easier because the app automatically sets the price to be competitive in the market. I have had very good success selling tickets. GREAT APP for last minute ticket transactions

title: Bridebook - The Wedding Planning App
description:
Congratulations on your engagement! Ready to start planning your wedding, your way? Bridebook is your very own, personal wedding planner that sits in your pocket, and doesn’t cost you a penny. We have “everything you need to plan your dream wedding” (Brides Magazine) and are "the highest rated wedding planning app in the world" (The Telegraph). So let’s get started!

*WEDDING CHECKLIST* 
Add your wedding date and get your own customizable wedding planning to-do list to get you from ‘Yes’ to ‘I do’. Follow your personalized checklist to always know what you need to do next so you never miss a thing. 

*WEDDING BUDGET TOOL* 
With your personalized wedding budget planner, you’ll be able to easily break down your wedding costs and track your expenses. Find out how much you should be spending on your wedding venue, cake, dress, and all the rest. 

*WEDDING GUEST LIST* 
Build your wedding guest list from anywhere on your Bridebook app. Organize your guests’ RSVPs, plus ones and even dietary requirements! Our wedding guest list manager will simplify one of the hardest parts of wedding planning. 

*WEDDING SCRAPBOOK* 
Save all your wedding ideas, all in one place. Organize inspiration, song ideas, vendor notes and all your bits and bobs with our fun and easy wedding scrapbook feature. 

*WEDDING COUNTDOWN* 
Track how many days are left until you get married! 

*WEDDING SHORTLIST* 
Save and organize all your favorite wedding vendors in one place. Add notes, costs and contact details and manage your team like a pro! 

*WEDDING ADVICE* 
Feeling daunted by the prospect of wedding planning? With Bridebook you have nothing to worry about! We’ll provide you with the best tips, tricks and insider secrets to help you save money and get down the aisle without a worry. And don’t forget to include your partner and plan together! Our new joint account feature makes teamwork easier than ever before. 

Your wedding, your way by Bridebook

recentChanges: Bridebookers, we've listened to your valuable feedback and have now released general improvements, fixed bugs and have improved site speed!
comments: Excellent app - very easy to set up and use. Checklist very useful - can add your own items. Good response from most Suppliers would be useful to be able to search for local Suppliers. Budgeting feature is ok-has columns for total estimate/total booked and target budget - a bit confusing in my opinion - if deposit paid/outstanding balance (+due date) were listed too this woukd make it clearer. Works well though - wish we had discovered this earlier in our planning process!

Fab 😁 I love this app! It's helped with my wedding planning immensely and it's easy to use. The only slight niggle- I wish you could do a seating plan on it. You can do a guest list and if they are all day or evening though which is extremely helpful when it comes to give final numbers to the venue. I also loved the options for replies to the RSVP's and it made it so much easier to know who I needed to chase up😊

I find this app absolutely amazing for wedding planning. There is a bit for guestlists, venues, a countdown to wedding day, loads of advice, and so much more. Its so easy to shortlist vendors and suppliers and send off for brochures and information for anything. This has taken so much stress off wedding planning so far and easy to have everything in one place. Highly recommend, not just for brides and grooms but for anyone involved.

It's a very user-friendly app which links very well to the website. I love the budgeting tool and have found the interface very helpful. Thank you! Update 16/01/2020 This was going so well but now it glitches. When I book a supplier it attempts to update the budget used/amount booked, but it refreshed to £15808 everytime. It is now stuck on this amount no matter how many times I update the suppliers and quotes and bookings. It's no longer accurate therefore losing its usefulness.

Since using this app I have not felt overwhelmed planning our wedding as without a checklist in place I'd imagine myself to be a bit of a mess ensuring I haven't missed anything. It is easy to use in term of search for venues (found our perfect venue on bridebook and is booked) YAY! I would highly advise this to my wonderful friends when they decide to get married! Love love love!!!! Xxx

comments: I used this app as a countdown for a trip. I started it at 40 days before we left. It worked great.....until the last 2 weeks when I had to open the app to get the days left number to change. It kind of sucked because I couldn't just look at the widget and see the days left and it was so close to the end of the countdown.
Stopped working. The countdown shows when I open it, but the widget stopped updating. If I poke it, sometimes it will update.
Functions well but it would be nice to be to select the skin from a drop down list rather than scrolling through the whole selection to see what is available.
Love the countdown, but the lettering is too small. Need to be able to choose text size and weight.
I love that it only takes up one space unlike other's where it's a whole line. I also like I can customize the color and add icon instead of words or both.

title: Hurry - Countdown to Birthday/Vacation (& Widgets)
description:
Hurry is a tiny app for big moments. Countdown the days, minutes and seconds for any upcoming event. A party, holiday or an upcoming concert? Sorted. Mark off the days until Christmas? Hurry will keep you pumped with optional notifications/widgets and refreshing new gifs. Hurry contains all sizes of widgets with variations to suit your home screen. Share an event with your friends/family so they can join in on the excitement too. You can repeated events and events straight from your calendar.

• Countdown to the big days in your life
• Add events from your calendar
• Repeated events (e.g. every 3rd Friday of the month)
• Share events with your friends
• Widgets to fit every home screen
• Backup & sync between devices
• Discover events near you
• More GIFs than you'll ever need
• Perfect for weddings, concerts, films, holidays, vacations, flights, birthdays and more!

comments: I'm a big fan. I'm surprised there aren't more apps like this. I'm a university student using this app to budget my time more efficiently by monitoring how much time I have left before assignment deadlines. I put my assignments in my google calendar and then sync it with hurry to get the countdown. To the developer: Can you please add an option for minute and maybe even seconds counting to the persistent notifications and to the widgets? It would make my life so much easier.

I'm really enjoying this app. It's great to be able to keep track of big events coming up since my calendar is full of very mondaine tasks. The only thing I would look to see improved is the sharing option. If there is less than a day to the event I want the number of hours, minutes and seconds displayed. Not just a zero. Also, since I paid for the app please give me the option to remove the ad telling people to get Hurry on the play store.

Loving this app. Have tried multiple countdown apps on the new phone and this is easily my top 2. It would have scored 5* except for one point. When countdown in its small size, it states my preferred method of counting (months) on the right hand side. When expanded it only gives me days. I would like to see the month/week/day/etc combo that most other countdown apps offer. Other then that, its perfect. 👍

Best timer app ever and even better than googles calendar. Didn't have it in the first place though...you can do anything. but what I find annoying is discover and all the ones (except home) when you go back to home the nearest one to whatever day it is will go stretched (I don't know if I said it right) like If you've seen the mini game and also how many people know the mini game? (To find the mini game you just have to keep on scrolling on one of your timers until you find it) that's all I say

It's a clean pretty app. It actually reminds me of an iOS app, in a good way (speaking as a recent former Apple user). The only thing I would complain about is a lack of an easy way to edit the event shown in the widget, the single event ones.

title: Mysterious Events, Amazing Facts, and Prophecies
description:
Some people enjoy learning a new fact every now and then, but others are absolutely downloading Mysterious Events, Amazing Facts, and Prophecies app. And the following many amazing facts, mysterious events, especially Baba Vanga and  Nostradamus prophecies and videos are for them.
 
 
From how big the world's largest plane is (wider than two football fields!) to how tall prehistoric penguins stood (as tall as professional basketball players!) this list of extensive and deeply-researched amazing facts is sure to please.

A Bulgarian mystic who DIED over twenty years ago was foretold of a dark 2020.
Trump and Putin's lives could be in danger and chemical war will see the European continent cease to exist, she said.
 
And before her death at age 85 she laid out a series of prophecies for the year 2020.
 
She ominously revealed that Vladimir Putin's life could be in danger, thanks to an assassination attempt from someone already working within the Kremlin.
 
And President Donald Trump could face the same fate too, with Vanga foreseeing a brain tumor that could leave him deaf - or dead.
 
She also predicted Europe will fall at the hands of "Muslim extremists" - but the old woman had also predicted this in previous years.
 
She said the extremists would unleash hell with an arsenal of chemical weapons.
 
Followers of the figure like to point to her 85 percent accuracy in previous predictions, drawn from research by a former director.
 
 
So download on Mysterious Events, Amazing Facts, and Prophecies app, and prepare to have your thirst for surprising information totally quenched for mysterious events and unexplained moments in the world.
 
 
Mysterious Events, Amazing Facts, and Prophecies app shows you amazing facts from different areas of life, presented as colorful animated slides. Installed so many times by people from all over the world, it helps everyone better understand that things around us are beautiful. You should try it if you like learning something new every day and share amazing new facts with your friends. Let's get smarter together!

Then you came to the right place with this but also the gallery of seventy-seven bizarre, fascinating, and simply amazing fact mysterious events, prophecies, predictions and shocking videos for you…
 
 
Thousands of interesting fun facts to keep you entertained for hours. Our Universe is a wonderful place and there's a lot of things that we will never know. Check this app and you will come to know about some of them
 
 
Enjoy our collection of amazing facts about the world? Then be sure to see our other posts on interesting facts that will blow your mind, fun facts, and interesting space facts that prove life on Earth is boring.
 
 
Mysterious Events, Amazing Facts, and Prophecies App help everyone better understand that things around us are beautiful, interesting and amazing. You should try it if you like learning something new every day and share amazing new facts with your friends. Let's get smarter together!

description:

And this is how it works 🎉
Just enter your planned wedding date and your name to start your personal wedding countdown. Choose colors, fonts, and background images to make the countdown YOUR wedding countdown. This way you know exactly how many days, hours, minutes and seconds are left. The only thing you have to do, is to say "I do"!

Share the moment ⏱
Count down the days until your wedding and share it with your friends and family. The built-in sharing lets you instantly share a beautiful snapshot of your countdown with your loved ones.

All your to-dos in one app 📱
Use the check list to track your to-dos, with built in categories like budget, location or decoration. Complete pre-defined tasks or create your own, and highlight all the things which are important for you! Additionally you can move and re-order tasks to fit your needs and prioritization.

Manage your guests with the guest list 👯‍♀️
Curate your personal guest list in the app. Tag your guests by groups and tables and keep track of the RSVP state of all your guests.

Your wedding day as a timeline 🗓
Use the wedding day timeline to plan ahead. Add activities and special occasions to your timeline in advance and be relaxed on your Big Day.

Control your budget 💸
Keep an eye on your budget with the expenses planner. After you have entered your wedding budget, you can add and categorize your expenses. This way you know which item is the most expensive one or how much money is left.

Your personal countdown as widget ⏱
✔️Add a widget to quickly see the remaining days until your wedding

title: Character Sheet (3.5)
description:
*********This app will be taken off of the play store on November 1st, 2019. Google is no longer supporting apps that are geared toward Android version 23, which this app is. I no longer have access to the code for this app, so it will taken down after that date. A replacement app will be on the store soon, but there is no way to transfer data from this app to the new one. My apologies for the inconvience.


This app is perfect for anyone playing D&D3.5

I used my paper character sheet as a template and built an app out of it.
This app will handle a large portion of the math for you! Meaning you wont need to calculate your ability modifiers, your skill modifiers, your Armor class, and more.


This is my first app, so it may not be perfect just yet. If you find any bugs, please email me a detailed description of your problem at RoBradshaw95@gmail.com and I will address the bug as soon as I can!


I am not affiliated with Dungeons and Dragons, or Wizards of the Coast in any way. This was made for fun because I like the game and want to share this thing I made with other fans of the game. Please support their official games.

recentChanges:
Fixed "to hit" so people can account for multiple attacks

Touched up the Weapon layout
comments: Very Clunky. Defeats the purpose ( for me at least ) of having a digital character sheet. I don't want to type everything in. Might as well write on paper or type up a word doc or Excel shetet. Poorly designed UI often does not fit well in screen. Skills section is hit or miss with being able to input values in their proper places. Could be a lot better with ability to import info from d20 srd, and some UI improvements.

I would give it 5 stars but as a few others have also noted, we really need that "are you sure?" prompt with removing characters.. I just accidentally removed a character that I had been working on for months and now I'm devastated.. Maybe an undo button could suffice as well?
Nice app. I would love to see an option that allows user to share their character with other users.

it's ok but it would help if you could list spells, weapons and have all the skills. There are a few missing from your list, and maybe a way to add a picture of the character. Also separate slots for currency to make it easier. Also under description if you can't do the pic, an area for character description. Just a few ideas to make it easier💖. Besides that it's an okay sheet!

Extremely useful for creating characters, I would give 5 stars, but that "remove" button needs some form of "Are you sure" pop up instead of just removing, because if you accidentally hit it you lose a character you may be trying to open to use, or just spent a long time working on. Other than that, easily the most useful app I have for D&D.

title: TickPick - No Fee Tickets
description:
The fastest, cheapest and easiest app to purchase tickets to all of your favorite events (sports, concerts & theater). With No Service Fees and a unique Score Report (to help you find the best deals) buying great tickets at great prices has never been this easy.

100% guaranteed ticket marketplace. Resellers may list tickets above or below face value.

--FEATURES—

1. Discovery – Find last minute events and deals in your area – or search any team, artist, event or venue to see schedules and available tickets.
2. Sorting - Overwhelmed by too many ticket options? Filter by price, quantity, and Seat Rating (determine by seat location, available only on TickPick).
3. Deals - Tickets are ranked by our patented Score Report (determined by price and seat location), which helps you get the best bang for your buck!
4. High Rollers - Use our proprietary 'Seat Rating' to sort tickets from the best seats in the house to the worst.
5. Seat Views - For all major sports see pictures of your seats before you buy tickets.
6. Track Events – Not ready to buy? Keep track of key event stats so you can make the best buying decision when you're ready.
7. Payment - At checkout, just scan your credit card and turn your device into your ticket.

comments: Game I purchased tickets to has been canceled. Trying to get a hold of someone regarding either a refund or a voucher. Instead, their help line causes the app to crash. It's been this way for days now. Regretting my decision to use this app.

Way to step up!!! I purchased a few hundred dollars worth of Spring training tickets through this app. TickPick was the first to refund my tickets! I also purchased tickets directly from MLB, as of today I'm still waiting for refund instructions...
If you have questions clicking the "Need Help" button immediately crashes the app. So if say your event was cancelled and you want to know how to proceed - you're out of luck.
Cannot find contact information to get assistance. Everytime I click get help the app crashes, deleted and reinstalled app still doesn't work. Went to actual website and cannot find contact info
Even though the service charge is technically built into the price on TickPick, it still comes out at least 15% less than if you buy from Ticketmaster or other services that charge service fees.

title: Event Planner - Guests, To-do, Budget Management
description:
Event Planner - Guests, To-do, Budget Management is a simple, fast & compact utility that helps you to manage any event, wedding or party easily. 

This event planner helps to manage event / party by managing tasks, guests list, budgets and vendors of that event / party.

Event Planner - Guests, To-do, Budget Management app features:
* Manages To-do tasks List - Add, edit, search, and sort task lists. You can add subtask lists also. Check task lists as it completes. You can view summary report of number of pending and completed tasks and subtasks. You can also generate PDF of all tasks or individual task. You can share PDF report with your family or friends. 

* Manages Guests List - You can add, edit, search, and sort guests. You can also add companions of guest. Check invitation sent as guest invitation is sent. You can view summary report of number of guest invitation sent and not sent. You can also generate PDF of guests list. You can share this guests PDF report with your family or friends.

* Manages Budgets List - You can add and edit budgets with payments for different types of categories like accessories, flower & decoration and many more. Check payments as your payment is paid. You can view summary of number of payments and amount are paid and pending. You can also generate PDF of budget list. You can share this budget list PDF report with your family or friends.

* Manages Vendors List - You can add and edit vendors with contact detail and payments for different types of categories like jewelry, Music & show and many more. Check payments as your payment is paid to vendor. You can view summary of number of payments and amount are paid and pending. You can also generate PDF of vendor payment list. You can share this vendor payment list PDF report with your family or friends.

* Event Dashboard displays summary of Tasks, Guests Invitations, Budget payments, Vendor payments
* You can add, edit and delete your other event categories.
* You can take Backup of event data into your local device and then restore it.

Event Planner - Guests, To-do, Budget Management App will help you to make the event or party preparation easier than ever!

comments: I've been searching for the card locations in the switch version, and this is is by far the most complete resource. I wish you could make separate folders for saved cards instead of lumping them together. Being able to click on a card to expand it and get a blown up picture of the card would be useful as well. Does what it needs to do, but some extra features would boost it to 5*
Good works 👍 and u need to change the design and add more colours to the app, and let us create a decks.

The only thing keeping this from a 5 is the fact that when you hit card search it stops the whole app to load the data for every card. I think a good change would be for it to not load card data until after you actually search for something so the app doesn't suddenly stop to load literally everything. Other than that though, works great.

Useful resource for checking Card Locations using it as a companion for the Switch Release. Kinda buggy text in search bar is cutoff and scaling for Galaxy Note 9 seems off. Ads are obnoxious, paid $5 to remove ads within the app and was still getting ads sometimes this is the most annoying thing.

Instantly uninstalled after getting a video ad that interrupted my first card search right after installing. Just not gonna support that type of invasive advertising. I know we all gotta make a buck, and having ads is fine,but there are better, less obnoxious ways to do it.

title: All Events in City - Discover Events On The GO
description:
Discover upcoming local events and outdoor activities in your city & nearby places and get interesting event recommendations. You can find events your friends are attending and follow them to stay updated on their activities. Every day find some new things to do near you be it a comedy show, free art classes, business conference or a live music concert.

You can also get tickets for various holiday events happening near you be it Halloween party, New Year’s Eve or Christmas celebration. Buy Tickets easily as we have integrated PayPal, PayU and also pay at the venue system for our organizers who organize interesting events to make your lives happening.
With All Events in City app in your mobile, you have the world’s best event guide in your hands

✓ Search from a pool of experiences from any city; Be it Events in Toronto or New York or London or Mumbai or any nearby getaways. Present in more than 30,000 cities in the world, you can discover just about anything new to do around you. If you are new to a city for a vacation or for business and wonder what to do in that city, simply search for that city. Few of the top cities from where we get thousands of events everyday are Mumbai, Delhi, New York, Chicago, San Francisco, Kolkata, Chennai, Rome, London, Cairo, Bangalore, Cape Town, Toronto, Sydney, Edmonton, Los Angeles, Melbourne, Singapore, Dublin, Johannesburg and many other.

✓ No more boring weekends. Get updates via email every week for top things to do in your city and other outdoor activities happening near you.

✓ This free Event Finder app also lets you share events, map them on google, add them to your google calendar, follow friends, meet new people, make new friends, upload event photos and much more.

✓ Register for free events whether local or global and get tickets right in your mail. Share it with your friends on Facebook with just the click of a button right from the app. Other sharing options like WhatsApp, Twitter sharing or email event information.

✓ Find mutual connections who are attending a new event every week and message them through the app to join you during the weekend or any other day during the week.

✓ The different types of categories we have for you are as below:

- Parties – From House Parties to Club Nights
- Music Concerts – Be it rock, jazz, blues or metal, we have it all.
- Workshops – Art Workshop, Cooking classes, DIY workshop, Yoga Classes.
- Business – Networking, Trade Shows, Startup Seminars, Exhibition, Industry meetup.
- Dance – Contemporary Dance, Hip Hop Face-Off and much more.
- A few more categories to explore are theater plays, sports activities, travel and foodies’ meetup, health and wellness, comedy, etc.

✓ provides you with your own event calendar. Also a perfect event reminder as it reminds you about the upcoming events through notifications. Keep a track of events you have attended, attending and invited.

✓ See the list of trending events and experiences worldwide or in your city. Major of the organizers that use our featured listing are from top cities of the world like New York, Las Vegas, London, Singapore, Toronto, Melbourne, Mumbai, New Delhi, Bangalore, Chicago, Johannesburg, Dubai, Manchester, Rome, Brisbane, Brussels and few other.

✓ This is also a great app for people in event management as they can connect to event organizers for business and volunteering. Sponsors always keep a tap on our app to find out the gatherings of people that can give their product great visibility. Event organizers can also check their attendees and pictures that were uploaded live during the event.
So what are you waiting for? Come join hundreds of thousands of happy people who get high on events every day. It is your perfect guide to sail through the week and plan your weekend. Download “All Events in City” and never miss any event in your city.

title: letmesee: event photo sharing
description:
Share those precious moments like weddings, birthday parties, vacations, etc with the friends and family you want to see them - and no one else. Customize who sees (and does) what.

Toggle whether photos are sharable or downloadable. Perfect for vacations, weddings, and anything else you don’t want to plaster on social media.

HOW IT WORKS

Create an “event” and set your permissions

Add your friends and family

Watch them add photos to and interact with the event

SHARE WITH PEACE OF MIND

Choose exactly what happens to your photos and who sees them.

-Your events are completely invisible and inaccessible to people you don’t invite
-Customize them with specific download and sharing permissions
-Allow or disallow people to add or delete photos
-No limits on the size, type, or number of photos you share

BRING PEOPLE TOGETHER

Create albums of events that those in your life can view and comment on. Share those special moments with friends, family, and co-workers - easily and without jumping through hoops. letmesee makes photo sharing fun and secure for everyone!

title: Halo: Outpost
description: The official Halo: Outpost Discovery app is essential for getting the most from your experience at Halo’s new traveling fan event! Immerse yourself in the Halo universe by discovering inside information, tackling exclusive challenges, and earning rewards. You can also use this app to navigate the Outpost’s schedule, attractions, and vendors with ease – all from your mobile device!
descriptionHTML: The official Halo: Outpost Discovery app is essential for getting the most from your experience at Halo’s new traveling fan event! Immerse yourself in the Halo universe by discovering inside information, tackling exclusive challenges, and earning rewards. You can also use this app to navigate the Outpost’s schedule, attractions, and vendors with ease – all from your mobile device!
summary: The official Halo: Outpost Discovery traveling fan event companion app.
recentChanges:
• Updated Anaheim Map locations.
• Updated Challenges UI elements.
• Updated Collections UI elements.
comments: I'm a Halo fan I played all of the Halo games it's was amazing when I saw this I was like wow a Halo game might as well play this but then as soon I played it, it just crashes and I never got to play it I even rest my phone still didn't work got another phone tried it still keeps on crashing so I stopped and never got to play it so fix it please🙏

Hardly worked in con center due to dead zone throughout. You scan something and have no idea if it took it. My husband's wasn't tracking his at all. It was also confusing what to scan; there were #s, barcodes w/ #s, then other #s that weren't related to the app. Some of the challenges, like interact w/ a Spartan, were confusing because it didn't say if those are real people or a cardboard cutout. The file is huge and it took forever to open, so don't ever push the back button, it exits the app.

I used it for the Chicago event and by then, most major issues seemed to be fixed. The scanner that you use to find some of the hidden stuff did not work well at all and it lacks push notifications to let you know when events are getting ready to happen so you don't miss them. Other than that, I didn't have any issues that I know some people at the Chicago event had, so your mileage will vary depending on your phone. I use the Galaxy S9+.

Fantastic idea.... Buuuuut. It freeezes and crashes like crazy and scanner never worked for me and that is very sad for me cause i am a very big halo fan. Missing out on scanning has you miss out on interactive things and collectibles. But if it were to be severely simplified and scanning was not needed for unlocking collectibles, as one of the attractions did by scanning your badge and it saves that info into your app without the app ever opening. So why not use the badge for every unlockable?

This app was designed specifically for the Halo: Outpost Discovery event, and they could have used a little more time fine tuning it. Pros: Great concept, useful information, and easy to use. Cons: Quite buggy, crashed several times, and wouldnt track all achievements completed.

title: TicketFire - Tickets to Sports, Concerts, Theater
description:
TicketFire has no service fees and the lowest checkout prices for event tickets in the industry, as well as a 100% buyer guarantee. TicketFire is the easiest way to buy, sell, transfer, or use any event ticket. To digitize a ticket within the app, simply take a picture of your ticket with the barcode and event information in view. In minutes, you will have a mobile ticket on the app.

-	Buy tickets to events like Ed Sheeran, Bruno Mars, U2 & Beck, Tim McGraw + Faith Hill, Janet Jackson, Hamilton and Aladdin and more
-	Sell your event ticket on Facebook, YouTube, Google, Craigslist, Twitter, LinkedIn, Snapchat, Instagram, and any other social media platform
-	Digitize event tickets to MLB, NFL, NHL, NBA, concerts, sports, broadway shows, theater, comedy nights and music festivals
-	Transfer your mobile ticket via SMS text, iMessage, Messenger, WhatsApp or other channel to a friend 
-	Mobile tickets: Get into events with your iPhone, Android or Apple Watch 
-	Apple Wallet : Add your tickets to Apple Wallet and get into events with your iPhone or Apple Watch
-	PayPal and Venmo: Easily receive payment from ticket sales from PayPal or Venmo
-	Ticket Sales Security: Mastercard, Visa, American Express, Discover all accepted through Stripe payment gateway
-	Email the PDF version of the ticket to yourself through Gmail, Microsoft Outlook, Hotmail, Yahoo, and all other email accounts
-	List your ticket for sale on StubHub, Vivid Seats, SeatGeek, Fanxchange, or other major exchanges
-	Barcode scanning: Easily digitize your event tickets by taking a picture of your tickets with the TicketFire app

You can store your event tickets as mobile tickets on your phone. Never worry about losing your ticket. Never waste money on overnight shipping through FedEx, UPS, or USPS to transfer tickets to a friend again. Mobile tickets remove the hassle of paper tickets so that you can easily enjoy every event experience!

TicketFire's mobile tickets and PDF tickets work with all major ticket scanners including Ticketmaster, AXS, TicketFly, Telecharge, EventBrite, LiveNation, Spectra tickets, and many more!

CONTACT:

Website: ticketfire.com
Facebook: facebook.com/TicketFire
Twitter: twitter.com/TicketFire

comments: You have to give all of your information (and permission to read your contacts) before you can see the prices. And then the total prices (including fees) are higher than StubHub and SeatGeek. Poor value and now they have your data. A lot of the reviews seem a little too perfect to be genuine, also. Go with a more ethical app.
The conversion from TM hard to TM mobile enabled a last minute sale and saved me from a loss. No DOE from the converted mobile. Excellent product.
When I'm looking to buy concert tickets, I always check TicketFire because they have the lowest fees on their tickets. I recently saved 10% compared to StubHub and SeatGeek for the same seats.
The last round of updates was pretty sweet - been using the app for about 9 months now. No quicker way to get rid of your hard tickets.
I recommend TicketFire! It is so easy to use. My favorite part is taking pictures of my tickets and putting them on my phone, so cool!

Getting tickets to the best performances in your city has never been easier than with TodayTix, the highest-rated ticketing app in the Play Store. Created by Broadway producers, TodayTix provides insightful guidance into the world of culture, allowing users to discover new shows and unlock access to the best seats at the best prices.

First launched for tickets to New York's Broadway and Off-Broadway shows, TodayTix is now available in London's West End, Chicago, Los Angeles, the San Francisco Bay Area, Boston, Washington D.C., Seattle, Philadelphia, Toronto, Connecticut, Houston, Dallas, and Melbourne.

----FEATURES----

TodayTix simplifies and streamlines the previously difficult theater ticket buying experience. 
Here's how:

- Take the guesswork out of buying theater tickets. We always list the best prices up to 30 days in advance. 
- Enter daily lotteries to popular Broadway and Off-Broadway shows. Win free tickets, access to exclusive deals, and more! 
- Unlock day-of Rush tickets at deep discounts on a first-come, first-served basis every performance day.
- Skip the lines. Book tickets in just 30 seconds or less, and never wait in long lines again.
- Sign up for alerts. Find out when tickets to your favorite sold out show becomes available. Get reminders the next time Rush and Lottery deals are live.
- Get the VIP treatment. Our customers rave about our friendly and personable service.
- Buy with confidence. Unlike many other apps, we work directly with the theatre’s box office, never with ticket brokers. 

----THE BUZZ----

“An app that solves the biggest annoyance with buying theater tickets.” - Business Insider UK

“The Uber of Broadway tickets.” - Forbes 

“Save money, save time, and feel like a VIP while you’re doing it.” – Entertainment Weekly

“TodayTix is for travelers who don’t feel like killing prime New York City touring time by waiting in line at TKTS, or for those who prefer to plan a few days ahead of time rather than risking their plans to the vagaries of same-day availability.”- Frommer’s 

----CONNECT WITH US----

Facebook: www.facebook.com/todaytix
Twitter: www.twitter.com/todaytix
Instagram: www.instagram.com/todaytix
Website: www.todaytix.com

recentChanges: We want to discover a whole new world of theater with you. Check out the new Discover tab in New York and London today!
comments: I heard about this app because of the Friday Forty lottery to win cheap tickets to Harry Potter and the Cursed Child. I won that lottery after a couple months of entering and the process was so easy and smooth. I loved the seats I was given and it was a great experience. I have since found that they also sell tickets to heaps of other theatre productions and ballets that I'm interested in and they always have great rush deals which I love. Definitely recommend this app to theatre lovers!
Was an easy app to use. Everything went really smoothly. Tickets were ready at the box office. Great seats and great last minute price. Highly recommend.

I use TDF for the best discounts but if a show I really want to see is not on the site, TodayTix is always my back up plan and almost always comes through. Seat locations are generally good, sometimes excellent. Prices help keep theater going affordable for me. App is very easy to use and always has a wide selection of offerings. Purchase process is simple and forgiving if you need to go back and change or adjust something. The email notifications are also helpful reminders and provide all the necessary details.

Really like this app. and I use it a lot. They have more shows and time choices than other sites as well as offering same day rush ticket options on some plays. Their only down side is that their prices are higher that some other websites, but they are still lower than most box offices and the big commercial ticket seller websites.

I love the Today Tix app! I was able to get a pair of lottery tickets at a great price for the play What The Constitution Means to Me! I thoughly enjoyed this thought provoking interactive show! Once you sign up for the lottory, the only tricky part is making sure you keep your eye on your phone the day before the event...because if you win the lottory, you only have 30 minutes to purchase the tickets or you lose them.

title: My Reminders - UniReminders
description:
This application will help you not to forget the planned tasks. This is NOT a to-do list and NOT a to-do list. It is just a reminders.

Key features:

• Reminders are divided into completed and active, they are easy to create, delete and execute thanks to simple gestures!

• Quick reminder creation - thanks to a simple and convenient interface, you can create reminders intuitively quickly.

• Material design will delight your eyes with a beautiful interface.

• Informative notifications display headers and descriptions of your reminders, with the ability to delete or execute a reminder right in the notification!

Thank you for choosing UniReminders!

title: SlimeFest 2020
description:
Welcome to the official 2020 Nickelodeon SlimeFest app, your mobile guide to having the SLIME of your life at this year’s festival.
 
With the SlimeFest app, you’ll have the most up to date festival information right at your fingertips:
- Access exclusive ticket and add-on offers
- Buy exclusive SlimeFest merch before it sells out
- See the full lineup and brush up on your favorite artists like JoJo Siwa and Why Don’t We, plus get to know new talent like Darci Lynne
- Keep track of your “must-do” activities, explore the festival map to help plan and maximize your time, check out photos from last year, get answers to your questions, see travel options, learn about our festival partners, and SO much more!
 
Don’t forget to turn your push notifications on, so you don’t miss any real-time festival updates.
 
SlimeFest is Nickelodeon’s event of the year you don’t want to miss. A day of music, slime and endless entertainment for the whole family. LIVE at the Forum in LA March 21 and 22, 2020.  Buy your tickets if you haven’t already and download the app today!
 
And for more info, visit us at nickslimefest.com or follow us on Instagram @nickslimefest.
 


Nickelodeon SlimeFest collects personal user data as well as non-personal user data (including aggregated data) and connects with 3rd party social media applications. User data collection is in accordance with applicable law, such as COPPA. User data may be used, for example, to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content and advertising; and manage and improve Nickelodeon's services. For more information regarding Nickelodeon’s use of personal user data, please visit the Nickelodeon Group Privacy Policy below. Our Privacy Policy is in addition to any terms, conditions or policies agreed to between you and Apple, Inc., and Nickelodeon and its affiliated entities are not responsible for Apple's collection or use of your personal user data and information.
 
Additionally, this App may use “local notifications.” Local notifications are sent directly from the App to your device (you don’t need to be connected to the Internet) and may be used to notify you of new content or events within your App, among other reasons. Use of this app is subject to the Nickelodeon End User License Agreement.
 
SlimeFest may contain in-app advertising.
 
For users residing in the EU, SlimeFest may include the use of persistent identifiers for game management purposes and installation of this app constitutes your permission to such usage of persistent identifiers for all users on your device.
End User License Agreement: http://www.nick.com/nick-eula/
 
Privacy Policy: https://www.experiencesbynick.com/index.php?cID=633

The End User License Agreement for this app includes arbitration for disputes – see FAQs: http://www.nick.com/faqs/

title: Nearify - Discover Events
description:
Discover all events you love, on topics you like, as never before, happening near you from more than 20 million events worldwide.

✓ Our users can discover awesome, new and amazing things to do, events in every city in India and outside India, such as trending events in Delhi, NCR, Gurgaon, Noida, Bangalore (Bangaluru), Mumbai, Pune, Chennai, Hyderabad, Kolkata as well as popular events in New York City (NYC), London, Boston, San Francisco, Las Vegas, Houston, Dallas, Singapore, Chicago, San Jose, Los Angeles, Atlanta, Austin, Miami etc including 200+ more happening cities of the world.

✓ Nearify recommends every day personalized list of events for you at the location of your choice. Also, find trending events for the weekend, weekdays or any major holidays in advance so that you can plan your free time ahead.

✓ Find what events your friends are liking, attending, when your favorite artists, musicians, comedians events are upcoming all at one place. 

✓ Never spend your free time getting bored sitting at home - be it a weekend or when you are on a vacation or travelling for work. For example, if you live in Bangalore and travel to Mumbai, Nearify is your friend to give you snapshot of places, things to do, Mumbai events as well as for your home town Bangalore events.

✓ Always know using, Nearify, what all is happening like College Festivals, Music Festivals, Dance Performances, Film Festivals, Rock and Roll, Karaoke, Food Festivals, Jazz Music, Indie Music, Country Music, Culture and Humanities, Sufi Theme, Theater, Magic Shows, Improvs and Stand-up Comedy, Bollywood,  Dance, Nature Walks, Live Bands, Dating, Blues Music, Open-mic, Mixology, Live DJ, Start-ups, Technology Product Launches, Adventure, Sports, Photography, Yoga Classes or any other interesting gig that you can attend, have fun when you step out of your homes, explore, and socialize.

✓ Use Nearify to invite your friends to your favorite events, share events with your groups on facebook, whatsapp, find directions to event venues, find events at your favorite venues, book tickets, cinema, movies. 

✓ You can even add your loved events to phone calendar to be reminded before the event that you should go and attend.

How to use Nearify
✓✓ After downloading, tell us the type of events you like from more than 2000 topics , your social profile (optional), and your location choice, and let Nearify do rest of the magic of finding the best ones for you.

✓✓ Take a glance of all these events, like them by clicking on the HEART icon or share it with your friends on any social platform.

✓✓ You can also follow your favorite artists and track their events.

✓✓ Well, that’s about it! Isn't it interesting!!

✓✓ Download now and never miss an event anymore

------------------
The story of how Nearify happened 

We were bored one weekend. Lot of time in hand but no clue about what to do. Despite scanning several websites we could not find anything interesting to do. No website was helpful in suggesting us events we could attend. In order to solve this problem and make discovering events easy, Nearify was born. 
-------------------------------------------
Now, sit back, download Nearify and enjoy events everyday.

-----------------for Event Organizers--------------
Nearify has a lot for the event organizers also - especially in Delhi, NCR, Gurgaon, Mumbai, Noida, Bangalore (Bangaluru), Mumbai, Bombay, Pune, Chennai, Hyderabad, Kolkata and other main urban regions in India. You can create your event on Nearify - Whether you are organizers of Fun events, whether paid or free, like parties, comedy shows, live music shows etc or you are organizer of business conferences, networking events or trade shows etc - you can in few clicks create your event and Nearify users will be able to see those events (Provided they are good events if not best). :) Let's Nearify the world by working together.
------------------


Also - Nearfy, Nearify Events, Nearby Events
