comments: So I proceed to download this app since I am in a town I dont know well, and I go through every option for 15 minutes and I select every single one which seems interesting, 61 topics I've selected by the way. And I am in a town of well over a million people. I eventually pick them all and it goes to a screen where it shows every event happening. The main menu, if you will. Anyway, it says there are no events... no events tomorrow, all week, or any other time either. It seems this app doesnt work

I tried this app once over the summer and found a free yoga class. Now every time I try to log in, it either can't connect to the Internet or "can't reach the Nearify servers." Huge disappointment, hoping it will get fixed soon.
App broken. Cannot connect to servers. No notifications from the company that the app is in development or shut down. No way of contacting them. Going to presume company pulled the plug & delete.
App not working. It keep saying error. A d nothing is loading. Is been like this for the past few weeks for me. Not sure exactly how long has been like that.

Could not onbaord. App would not consume my location. So i was stuck on the select your location screen. Eventually i cleared cache and went back through the flow with device locations on, allowed app permissions, tried manually enter a city and use device location. Neither seemed to get my location data delivered. So just stuck there. Samsung galaxy 8 OS 8.0. Seems like a good app idea. Id try again if you guys figure out what is going wrong getting location data.

title: Who Has Died Recently? Celebrity & Notable Deaths
description:
Stay informed about what famous people have just died. Our app includes celebrities, scientists, artists, actors, politicians, entertainment, television stars, sports related people and many more. You will be first to know which celebrities just passed away, how old they were - and more, you can get his full biography from Wikipedia (if such is available). Look at the most shocking celebrity deaths over the years.

Latest list of celebrities and famous people who have died in this month includes:
✓ Celebrity name
✓ Celebrity short bio
✓ Celebrity age
✓ Celebrity photo (if available)

You can light a candle or place a flowers for selected person and write some memorial message next to it, so everyone can read it.

If you click on listed name you will get full biography of dead person straight from Wikipedia.

You can also filter list by nationality and occupation (job). There is also possibility to search person on the list.

There is also possibility to set notification or place widget on your home screen, so you can stay informed about new celebs who are sadly died today.

You can add alive person to the watchlist and get notification when he or she die.

There is also historical data available (down to year 1999), so you can see who has died e.g. in January 1999.

If you know how to improve this app, please share it with me, and if you like it - don't hesitate to rate it.

This app is English only! Due to Wikipedia as a data source I can't translate it to other languages.

comments: No annoying pop up ads. Thank you so much for this. If you could add a feature to only see certain people like musicians or people in certain countries that would be awesome. Otherwise amazing app and thanks for making it for everyone! Edit: love the new update. Thank you so much! Changed to 5 stars for the update.

So far this is a very interesting app. If there are ads I don't really notice them and I find out about people's lives that I didn't know existed. Believe it or not it is not depressing and it's nice we can leave a candle and a message for free on peoples pages on this app . good job

I don't usually rate apps. But, in this case I will. my friends and I play a year long "deadpool" game for money year. this app is the greatest tool for updating me on deaths. I have notifications and it pops up as soon as I turn the let on. i give it a 5!!!!!
I really appreciate this app and what it has to offer. Notifications are great, I love that you can adjust the times of your notifications, and the "leave a candle" option was a lovely touch.
Very informative. Gives a lot of information on individuals.

title: TeleMapper 2
description: Telemapper is an all in one retail staffing and tracking solution that works with all major retailers.   It easily allows sales representatives to use their phone's GPS to "check in" at the locations they intend to or have been assigned to staff and then notify relevant parties.  Telemapper has optional time card generating tools and robust locations scheduling and reporting features.  The app will show their weekly staffing schedule if a schedule has been created for them and manages all necessary time and location tracking of sales representatives in the field.

title: Goldstar - Buy Tickets
description:
With Goldstar, you’ll discover tickets (often at a discount) to theater, Broadway, concerts, sports, comedy, nightlife, food fests and other events. We make it easy to fall in love with live entertainment again and again.

APP FEATURES: 

• New events are added daily. 
• Easy and secure checkout. 
• Exclusive discounts and complimentary tickets. 
• Earn rewards with each ticket purchase.
• Personalized event recommendations. 
• Star favorite events and venues to get alerts when tickets become available. 
• Get reviews, directions and helpful tips from fans who have already gone. 
• Event tickets for Live Nation/Ticketmaster, MLB, NBA, NFL, NHL, Major League Soccer, Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey, Cirque du Soleil, Broadway, Disney On Ice and more. 

Never miss out on what's happening in: Atlanta, Baltimore, Boston, Chicago, Cincinnati, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, Houston, Inland Empire, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, Minneapolis-St. Paul, New York/New Jersey, Orange County, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, Sacramento, San Diego, San Francisco/East Bay, San Jose, Seattle and Washington, D.C., and more!

HOW IT ALL WORKS: 

Unlike secondary market-focused ticket sellers like StubHub, SeatGeek, Vivid Seats, TicketIQ and Rukkus, Goldstar partners with event producers, venues, and artists to secure the best prices on live events for our members. We have ticket integrations with primary ticketers, including AXS, Eventbrite, and Ticketmaster, which makes it possible for us to deliver an event experience that’s on par with primary ticket sellers. You’ll also find our events deals on: Groupon, Living Social and Yelp.

PRESS: 

"The low ticket prices and plentiful consumer ratings of the shows are evidently creating a generation of live-entertainment junkies." -Reuters

"Goldstar offers a wide variety of entertainment." -New York Times

"...the scoop on cut-rate tickets to sporting events, concerts, comedy acts, museum exhibits, and more." -Consumer Reports

"Goldstar is a goldmine for theater & entertainment." -Star Tribune

CONNECT: 

Website - www.goldstar.com

descriptionHTML:
With Goldstar, you’ll discover tickets (often at a discount) to theater, Broadway, concerts, sports, comedy, nightlife, food fests and other events. We make it easy to fall in love with live entertainment again and again.

APP FEATURES:

• New events are added daily.
• Easy and secure checkout.
• Exclusive discounts and complimentary tickets.
• Earn rewards with each ticket purchase.
• Personalized event recommendations.
• Star favorite events and venues to get alerts when tickets become available.
• Get reviews, directions and helpful tips from fans who have already gone.
• Event tickets for Live Nation/Ticketmaster, MLB, NBA, NFL, NHL, Major League Soccer, Ringling Bros. and Barnum & Bailey, Cirque du Soleil, Broadway, Disney On Ice and more.

Never miss out on what's happening in: Atlanta, Baltimore, Boston, Chicago, Cincinnati, Dallas, Denver, Detroit, Houston, Inland Empire, Las Vegas, Los Angeles, Miami, Minneapolis-St. Paul, New York/New Jersey, Orange County, Philadelphia, Phoenix, Pittsburgh, Portland, Sacramento, San Diego, San Francisco/East Bay, San Jose, Seattle and Washington, D.C., and more!

HOW IT ALL WORKS:

Unlike secondary market-focused ticket sellers like StubHub, SeatGeek, Vivid Seats, TicketIQ and Rukkus, Goldstar partners with event producers, venues, and artists to secure the best prices on live events for our members. We have ticket integrations with primary ticketers, including AXS, Eventbrite, and Ticketmaster, which makes it possible for us to deliver an event experience that’s on par with primary ticket sellers. You’ll also find our events deals on: Groupon, Living Social and Yelp.

PRESS:

"The low ticket prices and plentiful consumer ratings of the shows are evidently creating a generation of live-entertainment junkies." -Reuters

"Goldstar offers a wide variety of entertainment." -New York Times

"...the scoop on cut-rate tickets to sporting events, concerts, comedy acts, museum exhibits, and more." -Consumer Reports

"Goldstar is a goldmine for theater & entertainment." -Star Tribune

CONNECT:

Website - www.goldstar.com
Facebook - www.facebook.com/goldstar
Twitter - www.twitter.com/goldstar
Instagram - www.instagram.com/goldstarevents
Contact Us - help@goldstar.com
summary: Broadway, Theater, Live Music. When you want to go out, start here first.
recentChanges:
- Even more ways to discover fun and exciting things to do near you with our new in-app experience.
- Improved search and filter functionalities to find exactly what you want to do this weekend.
comments: I love this app. There are lots of entertainment options at really great prices.

Goldstar is a great resource for me because I've been able to have more entertainment in my life. The ticket prices for the events are less expensive and using the app to purchase tickets is seamless. I enjoy your app very much.
Great entertainment. Affordable prices. It's the best!
Goldstar has given me affordable access to some wonderful arts experiences-- as a senior on a fixed income, this is a much appreciated benefit. I wish more events were linked to Goldstar!

comments: Really awesome. No matter I have paid for the similar app, and which doesn't work for me, and the developer doesn't reply on emails or on the store page, I have installed this free app, which works flawlessly. It's a pity that we can't send any money for this app. I would gladly pay. Thanks again 👍

I can't believe this isn't a native function in Google calendar to notify you on contact birthdays. I understand I can add them manually, but why have a spot in the contact for the birthday if I just have to input it somewhere else too? This app solves that problem and lets me use my existing contact database and get notified. Amazing!

Excellent app, very nice and simple UI. Still there is space for improvement to add more features. Will be useful to have Group to filter contracts inside app: friends, family and etc. Also will be nice to have zodiacs for each contact.

This app works well and does what it says. The only problem though is that it doesn't have an option to export and import entries! Bummer!! That's one of the most important features, even if it means backing up to just a csv file.

Good but some features don't work on Android 9: 1. Only english and russian languages work 2. Skype events skipped 3. Events with no year (google, vk, exchange) showing random birth year, typically "1"

title: Birthday Card Maker
description:
Birthday Card Maker
Birthday Card Maker App lets you send unique and beautiful virtual birthday cards and your favorite Birthday Songs to friends, family and loved ones.

🥳 Easily customize your design, share it via social media, sms, or print it. All you need is your smartphone 📱 and 5 minutes max!

Birthday Card Maker hands you hundreds of amazing templates, designed by pro graphic designer! You’ll be creating the best greeting cards or invitations EVER! 🎉🎉🎉🎉

Create typography, edit texts and fonts, add a photo, or even change colors around easily and quickly! Now you're going to get the design you love and want, no more pretty complex tools.

If you're not feeling too creative just send birthday cards with quotes or some music 🎶!

Bday is the most important day for anyone.

Whether a boy or a girl, a lady or a man, baby or old one everyone waiting for this special day with hope of amazing gifts, party and funny happy birthday wishes.

With Birthday cards maker your birthday message is going to be remembered, for sure!

Customizing your own cards used to be a lengthy and expensive process.. but not anymore!

Right now, there’s no more need for whole-family trips to the photo shop for the right picture, nor all the hassle of finding a graphic-designer in order to get your birthday greetings realized. Enjoy your bday cards and music!

The Bday card App gives you endless choices of inspiration and templates, which are all easily customizable too!

Personalize your happy birthday wishes, and make your birthday greeting card really stand out from the crowd!

——————————————————————

How does Birthday Card Maker work?

• Select category: Photo Editor, Birthday Status, Greeting Cards or Birthday Songs 🎶
• Choose the template you like for your happy birthday card
• Customize your card! Use the text editing tools, add photos, add birthday stickers, change fonts, create typography and select unique color combinations to suit your every vibe
• That’s it! Send and share your awesome design to your friends, loved ones or to print!

——————————————————————

Your beautiful custom graphic design is just a click away, and it’s all for free.. Get started now!

Download Birthday Card Maker now and start creating! 🥳🎁🎉🎈

Note:

If you like our app about birthday cards, do not forget to like us, leave a comment and rate ★★★★★ us positively, thanks 🎁. If you have any suggestion please give feedback to us.

title: Sched
description:
Sched is the number one platform for session registration and attendance management. Manage all the details for your complex multitrack event in one place. We have a vision of a world where events are experienced not endured.

Get more out of your event:

- Full Schedule
Conveniently browse the entire schedule for events on Sched. Get the key information of your event without ever having to crack open an event guide.

- Personalize your experience
If you've already created a schedule online, you can log in to view it on your phone and make on-the-go changes. If you need to sign up for a public event, create an attendee account to instantly save your favorite sessions to your personal schedule.

- Directory
View comprehensive professional profiles of speakers and exhibitors for the event.

- Offline Caching
Fully equipped with offline storage to make sure you always have your schedule, even if your connection drops.

Testimonials
- "Communication is the main problem that Sched solves. It's an at-a-glance snapshot of an entire evening that easily drills down into specifics. It invites interaction, so that's another communication problem solved/helped. I couldn't be more thrilled to have Sched working on my event's behalf. Thank you!"

- "Sched is our 'go-to' conference schedule for our annual conference. As the one who built out and managed the conference agenda, I found Sched very easy to use, update and edit as needed. Our conference attendees also appreciated the layout of the app and features it comes with."

- "Sched is really simple to use. They have fantastic customer service. The price was very affordable for our budget. They are constantly developing their software to provide more services. "

Enjoy the app and have a great event!

To have your conference, convention, or festival powered by Sched or simply get up-to-date info, please follow us online:
https://sched.com/
https://twitter.com/sched
https://www.facebook.com/schedsched

title: Edmtrain Concerts
description:
Upcoming EDM concerts across the U.S. & Canada! See your favorite artists live, and discover new music.

* CONCERTS - See what DJ's are touring near you.
* FESTIVALS - View events worth traveling to.
* MUSIC - Listen to the artists that will be performing.
* TICKETS - Links to buy tickets.
* MAP - Get directions to each venue.

title: Microsoft Teams Lansman
description:
Today's business life is changing. In the past, we worked at our desks, but now 70 percent of employees are spending time outside the office. In this new world we want to introduce you to Microsoft Teams, a brand new collaboration platform to meet the growing need for companies to work as a growing team.

The launch of Microsoft Teams in Turkey will take place in The Seed Emirgan on Thursday, May 4, 2017, allowing employees to work together more efficiently whenever they want.

In cooperation with Accenture, our esteemed business partner, Cetin Yilmaz will share his experiences on how to be successful as a team. Distinguished journalist Ayşe Arman will direct the clues to create successful teams in the corporate world. Finally, we will be delighted to see you among us at the first meeting of Microsoft Teams with live demos.

You can use this in parties, at home at the club, at school, or anywhere.

Features of Strobe Light:

	* You can Adjust the Frequency of flashes in range 1 - 30 Hz
	* Screen always on
	* Ads not intrusive


Strobe Light is the best option for tonight! beautiful, elegant, easy to use, chic and with a perfect style.

description:
The Tito Check-in app allows you to log in to your Tito account to download attendee lists for on-site check-in.

title: Birthdays & Other Events Reminder
description:
Our app “Birthdays & Other Events” will remind you about birthdays, anniversaries and other events. After launching, the app will perform full synchronization with all the events of your contacts from your smartphone or tablet. Now all important events will be kept in one place. Any event can be added, edited or deleted. In the settings of the app you can choose at what time and how in advance you want to be notified about an event: be it birthday, anniversary or any other. Aside from that, you can install a screen widget to always see the closest future event. Now you won’t forget to congratulate your friends and family with their birthdays or anniversaries and will know about every important event in advance. 

In the Celebrations section you can create a list of every celebration that is important to you and connect a list of people from your contacts that you would like to greet on each of these days.

You can greet any person directly from the app. A long tap on the desired event will open a context menu for you to pick “call” or “write”, after which the application will find the necessary contacts on its own. To facilitate the process in the templates section you can create different greetings for “Birthday”, “Anniversary” and “Celebrations”. Just remember to check the “use template” tick afterwards.

The app allows you to save a reserve copy of all data (birthdays, events and celebrations) to an SD-card or Google Drive, recuperate and synchronize them with the Contacts. This will help you to easily move all the information to your new phone.

The app supports 7 languages: Russian / English / Spanish / German / French / Italian / Portuguese / Indonesian. Want to help translate to any other language? Please, mail me.

title: Birdays – Birthday reminder
description:
You will never miss an important holiday!
Do you forget to congratulate your friends, colleauges and relatives? Birdays is all you need – simple app with reminders of upcoming birthdays.

Open app and find out who was born on your Birthday!
App has database with over than 2000 birthday dates of scientists, geniuses, painters, celebrities, singers and many other famous people. You will find out who was born today or on your Birthday.

Integration with standard phone functions
From the app you can send message or email with best wishes or just make a call.
You can choose in what time app should remind you about Birthdays. Also you can set additional notification.

Features:
• Easy to use
• Contacts import
• Widget
• Backup
• Night mode
• Material design
• Zodiac signs
• Age
• Additional notification
• Small apk size
• Birthday countdown
• Open source project

Project page: https://github.com/djonique/Birdays

If you would like to help with translation, please contact me: birdaysapp@gmail.com
or visit https://crwd.in/birdays

title: رسائل عيد الأم 2020
description:
فى عيد الام يحتفل العالم بموعد عيد الام لعام 2020، فكلنا نعلم تمام اهمية الام فى حياتنا جميعا ، وان كافة الاشخاص بدون ام لا يسوون شئ بدونها فيارب بارك لنا فى اعمار امهاتنا واجعل لهم جنات الفردوس يارب العالمين ، فكل عام وكل ام بخير وسلام ، فاليوم نعرض لكم مجموعة رائعة من الرسائل لتهنية عيد الام 2020، ومش بس كده بحثنا وقمنا بتجميع افضل الصور الخاصة بعيد الام للتهنئة ايضاُ ولتهديها لكافة الامهات فى العالم لتهنئهم بعيدهم، وسنضع لكم كلام لعيد الام و اجمل الصور عن عيد الام ومجموعة بوستات عيد الام واجمل ما قيل في عيد الام لعام 2020 وحالات عن عيد ميلاد الام 2020 للواتس وفايبر وكافة البرامج ومش هننسي مسجات عيد ميلاد الام ونص كلام عن الام فيس بوك لعام سعيد لها 2020.

المميزات:
✔ مجموعة من رسائل عيد الأم في تطبيق واحد
✓ يمكن إرسال الرسائل بسهولة
✓ يمكن حفظ الرسائل والمسجات في المفضلة
✓ يمكن تغيير الخلفية
✓ يمكن نسخ الرسالة
✓ يمكن أن يعمل بدون انترنت


يمكنك تطبيق رسائل عيد الأم 2020 من كتابة الرسائل التي تعبر عن مشاعرك ثم ارسلها لأمك أو حماتك.
نحن نرحب بإستفساراتكم وإقتراحاتكم لتحسين هذا التطبيق، ونتمنى أن لا تنسوا التقييم لتشجيعنا. وشكراً

title: TeleMapper
description: Telemapper is an all in one retail staffing and tracking solution that works with all major retailers.   It easily allows sales representatives to use their phone's GPS to "check in" at the locations they intend to or have been assigned to staff and then notify relevant parties.  Telemapper has optional time card generating tools and robust locations scheduling and reporting features.  The app will show their weekly staffing schedule if a schedule has been created for them and manages all necessary time and location tracking of sales representatives in the field.
descriptionHTML: Telemapper is an all in one retail staffing and tracking solution that works with all major retailers.   It easily allows sales representatives to use their phone's GPS to "check in" at the locations they intend to or have been assigned to staff and then notify relevant parties.  Telemapper has optional time card generating tools and robust locations scheduling and reporting features.  The app will show their weekly staffing schedule if a schedule has been created for them and manages all necessary time and location tracking of sales representatives in the field.
summary: Telemapper is GPS based retail staffing solution
comments: With my new update I lost my login so I tried resetting the password but one I get the message and enter the code it doesn't do anything. This used to be a great app

A.) This app continues to track your location even upon closing of the app. I'm not comfortable with this and it urgently needs to be addressed by the developers. B.) This app constantly uses your location services (GPS) even when you have closed the app. This equates to a constant and massive battery drain. One star solely on the fact that this app does not stop running once you have closed it. You manually have to force stop this app. This requires a lot of extra time and hassle.
Cant clock in and the password reset doesnt work. This app is a joke and It sucks that my pay is dependent on it.

Extremely slow and glitchy. App does not actually shut down taking large amounts of batterie power as well as requires acess to your location services, so simply saying it continues to track outside of times you intend to use the app there some serious fixes that need to happen overaul. Sugestions: have the location services only be active while you are during your work hours or intented use of the app allow the app to actually close and stop running fix over all usibilty is very bogged down
Giving this app one star feels like too much. Horrible design, horrible user experience, horrible in everything.

title: بنك المعرفة المصري
description:
بنك المعرفة المصري؟
الفكره والإلهام
----------------------
بفضل إيمان القياده السياسيه بأهمية التعليم والبحث العلمي لغدٍ أفضل، قام السيد رئيس الجمهورية بتدشين مشروع بنك المعرفة المصري في ١٤ نوفمبر ٢٠١٥ ، يعتبر بنك المعرفة المصري أحد أكبر وأشمل بنوك المعرفه الموجوده علي مستوي العالم نظراً لما يحتويه من مصادر معرفيه وتعليميه وثقافيه وبحثيه من أكبر دور النشر والإنتاج العالمية وبيوت الخبره المتخصصة ، كما يعتبر أحد المشروعات الرائده علي مستوى العالم من حيث الإتاحة علي المستوي القومي . 

يحتوي بنك المعرفة المصري علي أربعة مكونات /بوابات رئيسية وفقاً لإهتمامات المستخدمين سواءاً عموم القراء من الشعب أو صغار السن أو الطلبه أو الباحثين بالإضافه إلي العديد من الخدمات الأخرى والتي تهدف إلي نشر الوعي والمعرفة بين أفراد الشعب والإرتقاء بجودة التعليم من خلال تبسيط العلوم الأساسيه وتعزيز جهود البحث العلمي والإرتقاء بجودة مخرجات البحث العلمي إلي مستوي التنافسيه الدوليه.

تحتوي البوابه الخاصه بعموم القراء علي المصادر المعرفية المحلية والإقليمية والعالمية باللغة العربية والإنجليزية مدعمه بواجهة تشغيل وبحث سهلة الإستخدام ومن أبرز المصادر قناة ديسكفري العالميه وقناة ناشيونال جيوجرافيك التعليمية  والتي توفر العديد من وسائل شرح وتبسيط العلوم المختلفه في صورها المقروءه والمسموعه والمرئية كما تحتوي علي موسوعة بريتانيكا العامه الشهيره والتي توفر ملايين المقالات والفيديوهات والصور في كل إتجاهات المعرفة بالإضافه إلي آمهات الكتب التراثية والأدبية من المكتبة البريطانية باللغة العربية والعديد من المصادر الأخري كما تسعي البوابه إلي التكامل المشروعات الوثائقيه والمعرفيه المحليه  الموجوده في الجهات والهيئات المحليه كمكتبة الإسكندريه والأزهر الشريف وغيرها .

وللطلبه بوابة خاصة سهلة الإستخدام تحتوي علي نظام بحث موحد مرن الإستخدام للبحث في آلاف المقرراة الدراسية للعلوم المختلفه للمراحل الجامعيه وقبل الجامعية وكذلك الكتب المرجعية من كبري دور النشر العامله في هذا المجال فضلاً عن موسوعة بريتانيكا للطلبة ومئات الآلاف من الفيديوهات والصور الحقيقيه والتخيليه لتبسيط إستيعاب العلوم من قنوات ديسكفري وناشيونال جيوجرافيك

بالنسبة للبوابة الخاصة بالباحثين فهي تحتوي علي أحدث ما وصل إليه العلم من إكتشافات من أكبر دور النشر العالمية وأعرق الجمعيات البحثية الغير هادفة للربح حيث تحتوي علي آلاف الدوريات العلمية المتخصصة ذات معاملات التآثير المرتفعه في المجالات البحثية المختلفة بالإضافة إلي مئات الآلاف من الكتب والمراجع العامة والمتخصصة وكذلك قواعد البيانات والأدوات البحثية المتخصصه وتشمل أيضاً موسوعة بريتانيكا الأكاديميه وديسكفري التعليميه ، فضلاً عن نظام البحث الموحد الذي يتميز بالدقه ومرونة الإستخدام ونظام التصفح الموضوعي لكافة التخصصات

جاءت أيضاً البوابه بنظام لدعم إتخاذ القرارت الطبيه وفقاً للمواصفات العالميه وإستناداً إلي الطب القائم علي الدليل وكذلك خبرات المتخصصين دعماً لجهود الإرتقاء بالرعاية الصحية والعلاجيه لجمهورية مصر العربية .

كما يشمل بنك المعرفة بوابة خاصه لصغار السن مدعمه بنظام تصفح بسيط وتصميم متميز للأطفال ، تحتوي البوابه علي العديد من القصص و الألعاب التعليمية  مدعمه بالوسائل السمعية البصرية


عملية التأسيس والتنفيذ
--------------------------------
تشمل إتفاقيات الشراكه مئات من ورش العمل والندوات والدورات التدريبية مقدمه من أفضل بيوت الخبره العالميه لتعزيز الإستفادة من إستخدام المصادر المختلفه والرقي بمخرجات العملية التعليميه والبحث العلمي

البوابة تشمل نظام متكامل لدعم توثيق المحتوى المعرفي ،العلمي لكافة الجامعات والمراكز البحثية مما يدعم ذاكرة مصر العلمية والبحثية وهي كما يلي :

١) نظام إدارة المجلات العلمية وفهرستها وحفظها إلكترونياً

٢) نظام لإدارة المؤتمرات ويشمل إدارة المسابقات العلمية وإدارة ورش عمل المؤتمرات وإدارة تسجيل المشاركين وإدارة المعارض وإدارة النشر .

٣) نظام تقييم الناتج العلمي المحلي وهو نظام متميز متكامل تم تصميمه للهيئات العلمية لمراقبة وتقييم المجلات العلمية المحلية الخاصة بها .

٤) نظام حفظ وتجميع الناتج المحلي بشكل قومي حيث أن النظام يتيح لكل الباحثين علي مستوي الجمهورية الحفظ والإسترجاع بشكل مركزي مع إحكام إدارة النظام .

ومن المتوقع أن تقوم البوابة بإتاحة خدماتها كاملة لكافة فئات الشعب المصري بداية من 23 يناير 2016

تنبيه:
----------- 
*جميع الحقوق محفوظة لموقع بنك المعرفة بوزارة التربية والتعليم المصرية
وهذا التطبيق تيسيرا لمستخدمي الموقع من تسجيل الدخول والتصفح والاشتراكات بالانشطة المختلفة.

title: Quiltspace
description:
“I just love this app”

“Easy to use”

"So glad I found this community"

If you love quilting, this app is for you! Quiltspace is a free app that brings the world's most passionate quilters into one place. Attend quilt shows around the country, explore beautiful quilts, and share your experience with new friends and old.

Welcome to your quilting community.
descriptionHTML:
“I just love this app”

“Easy to use”

"So glad I found this community"

If you love quilting, this app is for you! Quiltspace is a free app that brings the world's most passionate quilters into one place. Attend quilt shows around the country, explore beautiful quilts, and share your experience with new friends and old.

Welcome to your quilting community.
summary: Quiltspace connects passionate quilters at conferences, workshops, and more!
recentChanges:
We got busy and fixed a few issues you may have encountered.
Please let us know if you find any additional pesky bugs!

P.S.: if you're enjoying our app please leave us a review or just send us some feedback at team@quiltspace.co
comments: I really enjoy seeing all of the quilts. The talent is out of this world. You don't have to be a so called expert to show you can quilt. Folks with a love and commitment to a craft. Awesome!
I get great ideas for future quilts and looking at the very talented quilters out there!
Inspiring! Beautiful photos! People who love quilts and quilting!
It's an awesome way for quilters to connect.
Love Quiltspace, the talent is endless. I never get tired of see all of the love and hard work that goes in the quilts. It keeps me inspired.

title: التقويم الهجري والميلادي 1441-2020
description:
السلام عليكم ورحمة الله وبركاته ;
التقويم الهجري والميلادي 1441-2020 :
التقويم الميلادي 2020 لكامل السنة 2020-2019 كما ان التقويم يتقاطع مع التقويم الهجري لعام 1441-1440 او العربي ويوضح اسماء الاشهر وترتيبها الرقمي.
اقتربت نهاية عام 2019 الميلادي، وهذا يعني أن أهديكم تقويماً جديداً للعام الميلادي الجديد 2020!
و بحلول السنة الهجرية 1441 اقدم لكم هدا التطبيق للتتبع اشهر السنة الهجرية و السنة الميلادية معا في ان واحد. ..
كذلك للتبع المناسبات الاسلامية  منها : رمضان ، شعبان ، عيد الاضحى و عيد الفطر ...

هذه المرة أقدم لكم نسختين منه: إحداهما يوجد بها التقويم الهجري 1441-1440 و تذكير بالمناسبات الإسلامية، والأخرى بدونها، وذلك لتختاروا ما يناسبكم منها.
التقويم الهجري والميلادي 2020-2019 الموافق 1441/ 1440 هجرية: تحميل مجاني!
التقويم الهجري 1441-1440 والميلادي 2019 - 2020 للكمبيوتر والجوال ومواعيد الإجازات...
التقويم الهجري 1440 هـ – تقويم 1440 هجري وميلادي 2019. تقويم 2019 الموافق 1439/ 1440 هجرية.

مزايا التقويم :
*حسب تقويم أم القرى.
*الصور جاهزة للتحميل.
*ميلادي/ هجري: 
-تقويم عمودي: لتسهل قرائته.
-أرقام الأسابيع للسنة كاملة.
-تقاطع ترتيب شهور السنة الميلادية و السنة الهجرية 

** أشهر التواريخ الإسلامية وتواريخها :

✿ 1 محرم: رأس السنة الهجرية.
✿ 10 محرم: يوم عاشوراء
✿ 12 ربيع الأول: المولد أو مولد النبي.
✿ 27 رجب: الإسراء والمعراج
✿ 15 شعبان: (منتصف شعبان ، أو ليلة الغفران
✿ 1 رمضان: أول أيام الصوم.
✿ 27 رمضان: نصول القرآن. (17 رمضان في إندونيسيا وماليزيا)
✿ في الثلث الأخير من رمضان الذي يشمل ليلة القدر.
✿ 1 شوال: عيد الفطر.
✿ 8-13 ذي الحجة: الحج إلى مكة *

السلام عليكم ورحمة الله وبركاته ;
التقويم الهجري والميلادي 1441-2020 :
التقويم الميلادي 2020 لكامل السنة 2020-2019 كما ان التقويم يتقاطع مع التقويم الهجري لعام 1441-1440 او العربي ويوضح اسماء الاشهر وترتيبها الرقمي.
اقتربت نهاية عام 2019 الميلادي، وهذا يعني أن أهديكم تقويماً جديداً للعام الميلادي الجديد 2020!
و بحلول السنة الهجرية 1441 اقدم لكم هدا التطبيق للتتبع اشهر السنة الهجرية و السنة الميلادية معا في ان واحد. ..
كذلك للتبع المناسبات الاسلامية منها : رمضان ، شعبان ، عيد الاضحى و عيد الفطر ...

هذه المرة أقدم لكم نسختين منه: إحداهما يوجد بها التقويم الهجري 1441-1440 و تذكير بالمناسبات الإسلامية، والأخرى بدونها، وذلك لتختاروا ما يناسبكم منها.

Whether you’re attending an event or following fandoms, experience more of your favorite communities with FAN GURU.

FAN GURU is the official app for a variety of conventions and comic cons all across the world! Discover thousands of events, follow the action, purchase tickets, build a schedule, share your moments, and more! FAN GURU is your one-stop shop for event information and fandoms.

Find us at Calgary Comic & Entertainment Expo, Fan Expo Dallas, MegaCon Orlando and many more conventions!


WHAT’S NEW
Create Posts: Share your experiences in the newsfeed and discover friends & their moments.
Purchase Tickets: Buy tickets in-app!
Event Maps: Navigate show floors with ease with event maps at your fingertips.
Attendee List: Discover celebrities, vendors, exhibitors and attendees when you enter an event.

KEY FEATURES

Personalized Schedules: Control your entire experience by personalizing your schedule in-app, with real-time updates and changes.

comments: App takes a lot of resources and if the phone has a low battery then the app works poorly

App wasn't much help. Installed so I'd always have the info I needed when I needed it even if I didn't have good cell reception... Didn't work out that way. First, not everything is even on the schedule (we missed more than one thing we wanted to see), second when my reception went down, the app wouldn't load it. Terrible design, not convenient whatsoever, and too much back-and-forth and clicking to get what info it does have. I finally gave up and just used the paper copy that was 3 pages of very small writing.... that was easier!

While some aspects of the app are convenient, it's clunky to move around and doesn't default to the current time so you scroll each time you want to check the schedule - although it does default to the correct day when you open the schedule. There is a color coding system, but it's not explained until you dig into the settings and seems a bit arbitrary. A floor plan of the convention space would have been very welcome, as would some form of alert for your upcoming events.

Good but could use refinement: when I click "my events" on the start screen, I want to actually be brought to the events I've earmarked than just the Fan Expo Canada button, of which I then need to tap, then tap schedule, then tap my events. I also found alerts didn't sound on time, often notifying me after an event was half/totally over despite being given priority. There was also no way for it to tell if I actually attend an event or not. I also want an interactive map, not just pictures.

I'm updating my review of this app even though the response by the developer is completely incorrect. I was connected to wifi and using it for other things, I just could not sign up on this app while on wifi. I tried 2 different wifi networks (business and personal) and got network errors and invalid information responses on both. Once I shut my wifi off, it allowed me to sign up with no issues using my data connection. The app itself seems to work fine now that the signup issue is dealt with.

comments: Love this app. Easy to use. Also awesome that that I can convert my files to pdf and save or share them. Excellent for organizing and keeping track
It's easy and convenient to use. It helps a lot with organizing and staying on track. Will up date my review after using it for a month or so

I find this app useful so far. There is only 1 thing that I REALLY miss: it would be nice to filter guests according to - bride's guests/family and - groom's guests/family. This would make the organization much easier. In the guest profile, there should be a switch for groom's or bride's guest and then also an option to leave it blank (which would probably mean common guests). Please add this feature to the app if possible :)
Hidden data uses & slow start. Too many adds on startup.

title: Tix Go - Play To Win
description:
Tix Go is the place to go to win tickets, VIP access, and more.

Go for the tickets

For every one of our shows we're giving away pairs of tickets to our best players. Tix Go ramps up the prizes as the shows approach. You can practice as much as you like, set a reminder for when the contest opens, then go for the tickets.

If the band is your jam, show us with an epic performance. Spotlights on you.

ShowPlay

Tix Go lets you compete for VIP access and other prizes at the gig as well. From one hour before doors to 30 minutes before showtime you can play our on site game called ShowPlay. You thought today was a good day, let us make it great, from VIP passes to just having a beer on us let us upgrade you right now.
